concept.title: Restrict Media
concept.shortdesc: Limit the type of media that gets into the App stream.

conbody.p: By default, all media attachments can be embedded into Apps. Livefyre allows you to change this option to prevent users from posting selected attachment types to your Apps.
conbody.note: Livefyre partners with Embedly for media integration. For more information, see Content Integration > Embedly Integration. Please contact your Technical Account Manager for questions about link expansion or sources.
